title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter, set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default and click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. <missing details>
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be retained in the list box of the report parameter after modifying it.
SR: Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and observe that the modified value 'aaa' is still set as the default in the list box of the report parameter.
